original_title: Paris By Night 131: Xuân Hy Vọng
overview: Paris By Night 131 is the 140th Paris By Night program (including special programs) conducted by Thuy Nga center. This is the 8th spring theme show in the Paris By Night series and the first to be filmed after a long period of unable to do so due to COVID-19. It was also the first show to be performed without an audience in more than 20 years.
title: Paris By Night 131 - Spring of Hope
